original_text: The circumcised believers who had come with Peter were astonished that the gift of the Holy Spirit had been poured out even on Gentiles.
korean_text: 베드로와 함께 온 할례 받은 신자들이 이방인들에게도 성령 부어 주심으로 말미암아 놀라니

sentences.original_text: The circumcised believers who had come with Peter
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로와 함께 온 할례 받은 신자들은

sentences.original_text: that the gift of the Holy Spirit
